content.detailedDescription:
I like to take pictures of special cloud formation. on 18 an 21 of february 2016 i was taken pictures with my s6 phone, and i noticed after taken that on some of them i have a spot but i thought maybe is a lens reflection. because many of my pictures were taken against the sun i almost was closed eyes so i didn't see anything with my eyes. yesterday i was checking the files and that spots intrigued me because of the gren color. so i zoomed them and i noticed a pattern of white spots on them never in same place. also the positon of the orb relating the sun position was different and 2 of the pictures in different days even give the orb a glow.
i am sending you this pictures because is not the first time in my life i have some glowing orbs in my pictures that i didn't notice when i take the picture. but is the first time is an orb with this color an this organised white spots.
please let me know what is you opinion about this.
content.summary: Discovered this after 1 month. it came in 2 set of pictures of clouds taken in 18 an 21 of february 2016.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside, towards the front of my house smoking a cigarette and taking notice of how clear the sky was in that early morning. i've seen this type of object in two other occasions while standing around the same spot. the first time i saw this phenomena was around a year or two ago while i was with my step father and we both thought it was an aircraft at first. we soon realized that this was no regular craft, as it made no sound neither had any of the standard lighting required by the faa. once it got closer and passed right above us, we saw that it was actually just a light that seemed to change its intensity and vary coloring from yellow - orange  - white. also, it was moving somewhat unlike a regular aircraft. it seemed to sort of vibrate or have a slight wobble to it. it looked like it was searching for something which creeped us out but we stayed and watched it until it disappeared over the horizon.  the other two times i saw the object i was by myself. i have a very odd sleeping schedule so i tend and like to go outside to look at the stars at night. the first time i saw it with my step father, the object was traveling from east to west, however, the other two times it came from the south heading north at a almost exact trajectory. i aways get a feeling that it is looking for something and the fact that i don't know its origins nor its intent seriously creeps me out. i don't relally get scared but for some reason i don't like whatever it is. on the most recent sighting i had in january of this year, i attempted to capture some footage of it and i would really appreciate if you guys could take a look at it and let me know what you think. 

thank you for your time.
content.summary: Orb like object sighted multiple times.

content.detailedDescription: Out walking the dog about noon on a perfect cloudless day and looked up to admire the beautiful sky when i noticed a light way above where airliners had been passing by, there seemed to be a structure that went with the light then i saw the 2nd light and finally the third forming a  classic triangle shaped craft (the lights were on the tips of the triangle).  it may have been pyramid shaped and i was only seeing one side of it.  i think so because of the way it came into view; it either phased in or rotated so i could see one complete side.  it was almost white or translucent in appearance but i think i could make out the outline of it.  i viewed it maybe for a minute or two but got distracted by some people passing by.  i wanted them to confirm what i was seeing and looked away for a second.  i couldn't relocate it again.
content.summary: Well above airliners in the area observed a white light that began to take shape (or rotate into view) then 2nd light at top and finally the third forming a triangle could maybe make out the outline of the craft

content.detailedDescription: One night a few weeks ago i went to bed a little later than i usually do only to experience what felt like an alien abduction. i sleep in a bedroom that is parallel by a few feet to my parents room. inside my parents room is a screen door that opens up to a balcony (as we all sleep upstairs). i remember moving so fast towards the screen door at night that it was as if something was rushing me to it and i recall being in a somewhat upright position. i remember seeing a big cloud of white haze/fog/mist on the outside of the screen door. the next memory i have was feeling very frantic the thought "i'm not ready" over and over again and what seemed like the presence of a few beings surrounding me as i was on what i believe was an operation table. the last memory i have is something going to open my eye as they were shut and being blinded by a bright light.
content.summary: Possible alien abduction.

content.detailedDescription:
My 5 year old daughter saw something floating around the air outside the back windows of our house. she asked me what the "red thing" in the backyard was. i went over to look thinking it was a bird maybe on the fence - i asked her what she was looking at. she pointed up in the sky and i looked up to see it. immediately i told her that it must be a red balloon floating in the sky. but it was intensely metallic. not see through at all. no lights. it was seemingly "floating or swaying" in the sky. i had been outside all day, and the wind has been intense, so then i started wondering why it wasn't being blown about. i noticed it wasn't rising or falling either. an inflated ballon would be rising - a deflated balloon would eventually be falling. it was doing neither - just swaying a little to the west then back east. i was never more than 15 degrees out of my view in its motion. it was also a square. didn't look like a cube, simply a square. i wondered if it was a balloon, why wasn't it rotating as it's being blown around. 

i went to look for our binoculars and was gone no more than 30 seconds, when i came back it was much farther off in the distance, but in the same 15 degrees of view. it was too far away to capture a picture. after a few minutes, it eventually just got too far away for me to still see it.

there was no fear or sense that someone was wrong or "off". my daughter wasn't alarmed in any way. in fact, it wasn't until after i had initially stared at it for about a minute that i started asking myself all of the questions above. it was vivid red in a clear blue sky, right after 7:00pm, before dusk, well before sunset.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red metallic square seen through back window

content.detailedDescription:
Near beach, walking dogs. looking at stars and noticed flashing lights, bigger than jupiter. i thought airplane because i was in disbelief then thought it might be helicopter because it hovered but it was silent and helicopters aren't big spherical lights that change colors like this. i looked away for a few seconds to tend to dogs and when i turned back it wasnt visible anymore.

a small plan did fly by shortly after with some alternating lights on bottom but it definitely was not same craft.
content.summary: Light flashing sequentially incl green, pink/red and 1 or 2 others. hovered silently.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard with a fire due to the nice weather.  looking at the stars and satellites.  noticed triangle shaped object, no sound, white constant lights in corners and red strobe in center that pulsated.  tried to figure out what type of aircraft but no sound and no wings, etc.  just dark triangle shape that creeped along. went and got wife to look so that i wouldn't be the only one to see it.  i looked to be about 3000 feet in altitude and traveled 210 course then 40 minutes later came back reverse course 030.  i was ready for the return and got footage with phone and night vision i use for hunting coyotes.  i live next to an air force base and use to seeing aircraft.  this was different and hope others saw it tonight.
content.summary: Triangle shape, white lights on corners, red pulsating light in middle

content.detailedDescription: I shot some pictures on my on phone on three different nights to what i think are stars. this was in bloomington, in and one of them to the left side if the moon and the other was to the right. the left one when you zoom in, you will see a cylinder shape in what i believe to be a star.
content.summary: Cylinder shape

content.detailedDescription:
The witness was driving home in his truck late at night. as he turned into the drive near his home his passenger noticed a disc-shaped craft just over the rooftop of a nearby home. as he looked up from the road ahead to view it he seemed to 'hear in his mind' an authoritative male voice saying, 'this is not of this world'. 

  he stopped the truck, got out and watched for 20 to 30 minutes.  his passenger did not stay outside with him. she went immediately into their home, as she was concerned for the safety of the children there.  the witness continued to watch the craft as it noiselessly and slowly approached where he was standing.  drawings are attached showing the shape of the craft from the side.  it had a 'nipple'-shaped dome on top which was shrouded in a swirling vaporous cloud which changed colors.  a sparkly zone shown 'like diamonds' around the perimeter of the disc.
  
at first the witness did not see any detail under the craft, but when it passed nearer to him he saw pulsating, colored lights in rectangular panels on the underside of the craft. 

there was no noise, emission of any kind from the craft and the lights from it were very bright, but did not seem to illuminate the ground or adjacent buildings. 

the disc was still in the sky over the homes when the witness eventually tired and went inside.
content.summary: Witness and a passenger saw a disc-shaped craft approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter as it silently and slowly moved very low over their neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription:
Virginia beach
i was leaving lynnhaven mall on march 21, 2016 around 7:50. and my mom had asked what planet was next to the moon and when i had looked up at the moon and jupiter i saw this black a little off to the left of jupiter. then about a second later it had turned to a very bright blueish white and looked like it had some rotational spin to it. i had looked away for about a second to unlock my door to the car and i looked up again and the object disappeared when i looked, but when it did it spun really fast and that was the last time i saw it that night.
content.summary: Very bright like a star, but spinning,

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home, viewing the moon and noticing that the star that has been next to it the past few weeks is no longer next to it, and also that it was a harvest moon. a moving, blinking light caught my eye. i thought it might be an airplane, but i followed it anyway. it was accending at a strange angle, and i continued to watch for another minute and it went higher into the sky. as it got higher the blinking lights no longer looked like airplane lights and instead started to blink in a nonsequential way, faster and faster. when it was highest in the sky, about 3 miles to the side of orion, it stopped blinking and disappeared. i kept looking for about five minutes, even when i got home. the only other thing i saw was an actual airplane fly by the house, but it wasn't anywhere near where i saw the ufo. and it wasn't in any flight paths at that time. i grew up next to ilm, and the house i live at now has moderate plane traffic, some helicopters, and i have seen numerous airplanes day and night, this was not one of them. i have experienced many strange things throughout my life and spotted many things in the sky but was nervous about saying anything. this is my first report because i was waiting to see it again.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo going up in 45 then disapears from sight!

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to relieve aft watch, when he said to "tell the captain to pull over, we have a cop behind us", as i cleared the super structure i seen that an object was coming up our port side with flashing lights that looked like a cop car, were steaming at a stearage speed as i just left the helm, the object was under water and was silent it kept pace for just a few seconds and made a sharp port turn like a tracer bullet out to the horizon. as others observed and was reported to the bridge, the speed proved that it wasnt ours.
the qaurter master was ordered not to enclude it in the logg, i know this because we where friends. and on the same deployment our combat central tracked contacts (air) that where not explained and also not logged. the lookouts who observed those contacts were councled by ships command and were told to keep quiet and was told it was new helicopters that the navy was testing. but the speed and course changes told another story. these were frequent occurances.
content.summary: Uss navy 1988, came up port side 25yrds

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechtner  on march 23,2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
on a tuesday night, while sitting in my driveway facing the northeast, with a friend, i saw the super bright light again. it appeared near the big dipper. it would flash eye blinding bright and then dim when it moved and stopped. it moved and stopped and did the same thing several times.

i reported the same sighting back in october 13th,2015, many people saw it then too. that case number is 71522.

i see a lot of commercial and military aircraft fly over all the time. i usually see this flashing ufo in the darkest part of the sly, near the tail of the big dipper. i have seen satellites and meteors and this flashing ufo seems to be in front of them. it always appears in the same area. 

i live near harrisburg international airport and three mile island so i see a lot of commercial and military aircraft fly over all the time.

this is different.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Once again i saw the flashing super bright blinding light in the sky near the big dipper

content.detailedDescription: Must discuss to long to write up
content.summary: Waiting in vehicle as kids gif a shirt delivery noticed 4 lighted objects in dark skies one of them came toward the vehicle but did a 180 degree and went up for over a weel have been here onl at nightsy

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the owner of this jpeg picture. i was visiting a friend in manchester and we went round to one of he's friends for a coffee. there were a few people there including the dad of my friends friend. somehow the topic of conversation went onto the subject of our universe and my friend mentioned that i was into ufo's. immediately, the dad of my friends friend stood up and said "hey, i saw something weird in the sky on the way to work last week whilst crawling in traffic. i had my phone on the dashboard and i picked it up and took one pic of it. i looked at it for about 20-30 seconds and it just stood there. i have never seen anything like it. it was not a plane or a hot air balloon or a friggin helicopter. i dont know what it was but i thought it was weird and took a pic of it. then the traffic started moving and i forgot about it and concentrated on driving."

that is what he roughly said. i tried interrogating him but he was one of those live for today types who believes in nothing and has hardly any educational background, a working class van driver basically. he just kept going off the subject and didn't want to entertain me on my ufo thoughts. but from his mannerism and the enthusiasm in the way he described the event, it led me to believe he was not lying. and when he showed me the photo, i was gob smacked.

now, to get the photo, i had to go round his sons house the next day and he pulled it off his dads facebook page, where he uploaded it to. i say this because the original may be better quality but i cannot be certain, just laying down the facts for your scrutiny. but i'm sure the original i saw on the phone was a lot clearer and detailed, but that also could be because of a smaller phone screen.

anyways, hope this is a valid ufo, looking at it closely, i believe it is.....
content.summary: Seen hovering whilst in traffic on the way to work. traffic started moving then lost sight.

content.detailedDescription: Had just been shopping. was going to vehicle when i could hear all the commotion. i was not sure what exactly i was looking at but knew i was not the only one......It just seemed strange to me and all the noise from the helicopters prompted me to take a picture. this dull but dark grey object simply hovered. i was not there for long so was not sure what happened later. all i thought about was that this was a very strange event!!! there could of been many more helicopters.....As it was so noisy. wished i had my camera with a telephoto lens. weird day.
content.summary: Noticed and heard at least two helicopters towards the right of my photo.....You need to enlarge it.......You will see the two and can easily see them!!  to the far left you will see a larger object that seemed to get the attention!!!

content.detailedDescription: We had just come home and i was coming out of the garage to go into home and notice a bright green light in nw sky. i observed object fall which took approx. 30 seconds and then was gone. object fell slow and once was around tree line gone. looked to me as a bright green flare coming down. it did not change course and did not change in size or color. it did appear to be slightly flashing as a flare would be. there was no noise i remember this because when i stepped outside everything was very silent which i thought was odd. no animals, frogs, or usual noise. explained this to friend who said i should report on this site. object may have been  witnessed by neighbors who were on porch
content.summary: Came home and had came out of garage to go into home and saw bright green glow in nw direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was on pensacola beach near where i live testing out my new 24mp nikon d3300. i love to take over exposed and slow shutter speed shots at night. i liked the fact that there were relatively a lot of people on the beach for an evening. so i took a few shots on manual settings to capture the glow effect i like. my first shot i thought i saw something in my view finder. i took the shot and looked in the sky to find what i thought i saw. it was yet another of the amber orbs this area seems to attract. i took another shot without putting my eye to the view finder and let the camera focus by feel. when i heard the focus audio signal, a short beep, i snap a second shot. as i watched it the object moved from west to east over the beach. i zoomed in with what little i could as i only had a 18-55mm lens on my camera. but when i looked for it in the view finder, i couldn't see it anymore. when i pulled my eye away from the camera to look at it again, it was gone. 

please note again, i was on manual controls. so when i took the 2nd shot, the result was what looks like an elongated cigar shaped ufo. but from the ground eye perspective, it remained an orb. the cigar shape is an illusion from the camera settings. but luckily i did have it on manual controls. because in the first shot, you can clearly see the ambient light of the object interact with the foreground as it emerges around a storm cloud.

have seen several of the amber lights while living in the area over the years. this is the first time i actually caught one with a camera. have seen them much bigger and much closer. years ago over tiger point when i was delivering pizza in college, i came to a cul de sac and every one was out of there houses. i thought it was a block party. but when i walked up to the customer she said "look". i looked up and there was a more rose colored than amber light that seemed to be the size of a swimming pool about 2x tree top level, maybe 100 feet. just as i looked at it, it split into 2, then 4, then 8, then 16, and on and on into smaller fractals. then all the small parts reformed in another location as the large orb. i saw swimming pool in part because, yes it was about 30' in diameter. but also because the light coming from it had that glow you get from underwater lights. 

just listened to your recent show with kyle from ufo proof. and i have been feeling these orbs were some sort of advanced form of life we do not yet have a grasp of yet. perhaps they are a life form that has somehow transcended the need for a physical body. all i can say, is that when i saw the film kpax, i immediately thought of the weird plasma shapes that are so common in the are. 

going to try to get more video of these and post them to my own youtube channel, ufo experience. i really appreciate what you do. you have an excellent channel. also appreciate you called out third phase of moon. i'm pretty good with 3d studio max and after effect. and, i could have sold out and made fake ufo videos for a long time now. but the subject is too interesting to me. and i'd rather get authentic images. been seeing them since i was a 7 year old kid, and only now got two shots. jeeze! just two shots! you'd think by now i'd get invited onto a real flying saucer and get an interview with the pilot!

attached are the two original pics i took on 8-30-15. and i've also included some zooms i did in photoshop.
content.summary: Amber orb appears out of strom cloud

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I am a ammature meteorologist with 2 years of college meteorology classes under my belt. i have been fascinated by the weather ever since i was a child. i am a middle aged person who has never seen a u.F.O. in person. i own a canon rebel t5i 18 megapixel camera which takes 1920x1080 high definition video. i take photos and videos of special weather evens like blizzards, tropical storms, hurricanes, lightning, etc... on march 18, 2016 approximately 1 p.M., i was in my backyard shooting video of some swirling clouds due to convectional heating of the ground combined with a straight-line wind ahead of an approaching nor'easter which gave us snow on the first day of spring. i was viewing the clouds through the small color lcd display on the back of my camera. while i was shooting the video, i did not notice anything out of the ordinary. when i was done shooting the videos, i came into the house and uploaded the videos onto my macbook pro with a 15 inch retina display. 

what comes next shocked me to the core. in one of the videos, i watched an unidentified flying object shoot across the screen from the top of the screen to the bottom of the screen. the object did not fly in a perfectly straight line. the flight path turned slightly. at first, i had to logically rule out everything manmade or natural or a malfunction with my equipment.
note: i have taken hundreds of videos of weather events. i can say without question the camera and lens are both in perfect working order and i have never seen any artifacts on any of the videos i have taken with this camera and lens.  
i watched the video over and over and over again. i watched it in normal speed, slow motion, forward and in reverse, and frame by frame and even zoomed into the object by taking snapshots of the frames with the object in it. first, the object was flying a hypersonic speed. how do i know this? at the height the object was and how short the time was for the object to go from the top to the bottom of the screen was extraordinarily fast. faster then anything i have ver seen in my life. normally, anything flying at even supersonic speed creates a sonic boom and loud engine sound. this object did not make a sound. if i were to make an educated guess of the speed the object was traveling at, i would say it was traveling at least a thousand times faster then a passenger jet. second, the object was shinny silver in color. how do i know this? while the object flew under a cloud, it was dark grey in color. when the object emerged from beneath the cloud and was under a blue sky the object was white. the object turned white because it was reflecting the direct sunlight. this makes the object shinny silver. while i was recording the video with the object in it, i did not see it with the tiny lcd display on the back of my camera. so, obviously i could not track the object or zoom into the object because i did not even know it was there. if i were looking into the sky with my naked eyes, i would have seen the object fly across the sky.
now, i consider myself to be a rational, logical person with a lot of skywatching experience due to my fascination and hobby with weather.  with my experience, i can safely say what it was not. it was not ball lightning, a meteor, a shooting star, a weather ballon, a plane or jet, a bird or insect, a piece of paper or a ballon, and it was not an artifact from my camera. that being said, after watching the video and the snapshots of the frames with the object in it, i am positive the object is a true u.F.O. once i realized this, i was extremely excited that i may actually have for the first time in my life, raw video of a real unidentified flying object. i need to have this video examined by people who really know how to evaluate what i caught on video and that is why i submitted this to mufon.
content.summary: U.F.O. sighting shinny silver in color traveling at hypersonic speed under cloud grey, under blue sky white. reflective.

content.detailedDescription: I have photo and video of something i cant explain..One is a redlight in sky that jut stayed in one spot for over a minute then i ran in house to get photos and video of it   when i uploaded the video o my computer i seen something else i could not see with m eyes..There are 2 objects in sky and something shoot a light at the other object and it moved out of the way it was so fast...I have on video .     i was on my prch smoking when i seen red object.. i think i have other pic and video to but not good with computers not sure i sent you ...
content.summary: 2 events of ufo at same time

content.detailedDescription: I have a fruit pineapple fields in the area.  there ara an unexcaved cave in my farm and the activiy is maybe every day.   little time ago the state open a hidro electric - water dam.   i capture the ufos several times in photo a video to.
content.summary: Extremely speed machines witout noise.  several activity

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing at the suggestion of my wife to find out if anyone else contacted you about strange lights visible on a warm wisconsin night in early march.  i am a retired teacher/school administrator so i guess i dont have to worry about folks thinking i am hallucinating. 
on the evening of march 7, 2016 i was driving my 1994 chevy van, hauling blood south from stevens point, wisconsin to madison, wisconsin for the red cross.  i left stevens point at about 7:30 pm cst traveling on interstate 39/51 on a first warm evening of the spring, about 56 degrees at the time.  
traffic was light with gaps of one to two miles between cars.  about fourteen miles south of stevens point, a set of three lights turned on in the sky above the highway that looked like three lights from a vanity mirror.  i recall no color in the lights, but i was struck by the fact that there was no glare emanating from the lights. the lights seemed stationary and after about 5 to 8 seconds, the lights swirled on a horizontal plane, one following the other, like circling a drain, or like a computer icon spinning when a program is loading, then disappeared into itself.  
(i live 15 miles from the dane county airport, east of madison wisconsin on a farm.  i see planes coming from milwaukees mitchell field heading west over our farm at all times of day or night on a daily basis. the plane lights appear to have a glare to my eyes, and there is always a strobe flashing.)
the three lights were not flashing and they appeared to be about the same altitude as the jets that come over our farm 15 miles prior to their landing at dane county airport.  the lights could have been a half mile to 5 miles away, not sure.  my initial reaction to the lights is that of a jet on a path to the central wisconsin airport about 20 miles north of stevens point, but with no strobe, and no appearance of moving toward or away from my location, i posited other explanations.  i guessed that maybe i had some configuration of interior lighting inside the van that might be reflecting up in the windshield , so i moved my head close to the windshield and around the cab but there was no effect.
i picked up my cell and called my brother since he is a technology guy that maintains police and government communication equipment for a local county.  i left a message with him to check on flights going to central wisconsin airport, just in case my eyes were lying to me.  as i was completing my message, about 4 miles down the highway, the three lights again appeared, but now they were to the east (on my left) and i was viewing them through the driver door window glass.  they again appeared stationary and once again, the lights seemed to circle into themselves and disappear.
as i think about other explanations, i know that this area south of stevens point is a flat sandy soiled potato growing area.  there are planes that crop dust and apply fertilizers, but being march 7 with the snow just having disappeared and the frost not quite yet gone, i doubted i was seeing lights from a crop duster in the dark.  
then i thought, hmmm, winter ending, first warm night, maybe someone is flying a drone that hovers and has cool lights.  and it is a drone they can control over four miles.
oh well.  just wondering if anyone else reported it.
content.summary: The lights seemed stationary and after about 5 to 8 seconds, the lights swirled on a horizontal plane, one following the other, like circling a drain, or like a computer icon spinning when a program is loading, then disappeared into itself.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my neice were in the mcdonald's drive thru waiting on our food when all of a sudden i notice this missle type object fly directly in front of my car, hover for about 1 second, then fly away at a tremendous speed, maneuvering around the restaurant and several buildings before disappearing. all of this happened in the space of about 3 seconds. i asked my neice if she saw it and she said yes. apparently, the local army reserve were flying drones at the airport not far from the restaurant, but i have never seen a drone that can maneuver like this one or go as fast. the object was going extremely fast. if i had not been looking forward, out the front windshield, as my neice was doing also, we would have never noticed it. it made no sound. it had no lights. it had what looked like very short wings at the back of the object. if it were a drone, it was extremely fast, maneuverable and had the capability to hover, then take off at unbelievable speed.
content.summary: Fast, missle like object, light grey color flew directly in front of my car, hovered for about 1 second, then flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room getting ready to go to sleep it was 1:47am, i know the exact time because i told myself that i was still going to be able to get up early despite the time. i was sitting on my bed, then the next thing i know i am walking from my kitchen to the bathroom, i remember thinking to myself "why was i in the kitchen?" i didn't have food or anything in my hands. on the way down the hall to the bathroom i passed my bedroom door and as i walked past i looked in the room (as i always do passing doors) took 2 more steps, then stepped backward and looked in the room again, there it was standing in front of my patio door almost as tall as the door. i froze and my jaw dropped.
it turned its head looked at me and vanished threw the door. i shook my head and went to the bathroom, when i walked back into the bedroom i looked at the clock and it was after 3am. i sat on the bed and tried to recall walking to my kitchen or what i had been doing this whole time but couldn't remember anything except a strange bracelet. i felt compelled to draw the creature and the bracelet in hopes to clear my mind and get some sleep.
i told my husband about this in the morning, thats when we noticed the furniture i have my heavy jewelry box on had been pushed away from the wall right where the creature had been standing.

my husband and i felt that the stand having been moved was extremely odd. there would be no reason for us to have done it nor would either of us do it at random. 
my husband also recalled having slept heavier then normal that night. 

though many things of this nature have occurred throughout my life i have never spoken out about them for fear of ridicule. i have many experiences but only recently began to document what i remember as it happens currently. i hope by sharing this i can inspire others to come forward, or spark a memory of a similar event in someone else.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: I believe i was abducted, one min i'm in my room, the next i'm walking to the bathroom from my kitchen and its 3am thats when i seen the creature standing in my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription:
1: in my backyard smoking
2: looked up at the stars
3: helicopter or plane
4: it was completely dark in the part of the sky i was looking at. then looked like beam of light pointed straight at me. then went off....10 seconds later on again. i called my daughter out to take a look. she gasped when it happened. the light was as high as a start...But as bright as a low flying helicopter. no sound. the object only moved about an arms length across the sky ne towards se. white light blinking randomly.
5: i'm completely miffed about what this might be.
6: a passenger airline was coming from south to north towards sfo and the light stopped. waited about 10 minutes to see if it started again...It didn't



p.S....About a week ago i looked up in the nw sky and was looking at the stars. one of them was moving really slow from n to s. then about an hour later i noticed one moving s to n. they were extremely high...I assumed they were satellites.
content.summary: Pulsating light very very slow moving - lights were random

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony looking at the glow of the moon behind the clouds when i noticed an orb of light hovering in the distance (east north-east)above the tree-line. what caught my attention was how fast the lights on it were flashing, it was far too fast to belong to conventional aircraft, with the flashing of the lights being milliseconds apart. the colours flashed in sequence of white-blue-red, and repeated rapidly.

after hovering for a few seconds, the orb started moving very fast in a curving flight path towards my direction. i saw two tiny orbs of light appear to spark out faintly beside the craft, before disappearing as the craft moved.

as the craft approached it stopped and suddenly vanished, it disappeared just as i was looking at it. this prompted me to stay outside for an extra minute trying to see if i could find it, with no luck, i returned inside.

the whole event from me spotting the craft to it disappearing was around 2 minutes in time.
content.summary: Rapidly flashing orb of light hovered above distant tree-line, and moved at a fast pace before disappearing instantly

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down rt 30 east bound and first noticed the object in the air in matteson il. i noticed it because it was shaped very odd! it was like something i have never before seen in my life. at first i thought it was an airplane that was completely vertical, but i then realized how lit up the object was. i realized it was entirely too bright to be an airplane! i continued to follow the object while driving down rt 30, and the closer i became, the larger it seemed to get. i tried to speed up as fast as traffic would allow, (approx. 13-15 min has gone by now)all the while keeping my eyes on the object, and then it just disappeared into thin air! it was like someone just turned the lights off! it was gone!
content.summary: I watched it for 15 minutes hovering with bright lights, and then it disappeared into thin air.

content.detailedDescription: House started shaking like a plane was crashing .I went out side and a large object around the size off a c-5 galaxy went over my house and neighbors house then turn south east in distance . (possible military plane) no bases near my home.
content.summary: Shaking my house

content.detailedDescription:
First off i would like to say that i know by what i was doing at the time probably makes my the type of witness that you would probably look down on but please here me out i have avoided talking about this to people because i fear they may deem me crazy. i think i was taken 30 minutes of time was lost.

1. i waited until my girlfriend at the time fell asleep so i could smoke a joint outside ( this is why i never told this story because i were doing something illegal ). it was outside when i saw the ufo and wasn't actually stoned at this point had only just lit the thing and had 2 pulls of it.

2. before i went downstairs i noticed there were 6 planes queuing to land at the airport through the roof window approx 10 miles away. i found this odd it's rare to see so many planes going around in a circle but what i saw next made a lot of sense as to why. so i quickly rolled this thing go outside close the door quietly not to wake anyone up light it started looking at the planes and then i noticed the ufo out the right side of my vision. the planes were 10 miles away directly in front of me.

3. at first i thought it to be another plane, but at a second look this was no plane.

4. the ufo was hovering making a slight humming noise above me it's like it knew i was there it was matte black with yellow green lights just before each point, it stuck out because the sky was not completely black but the light on this ufo were not highly bright either.

5. i was in disbelief but not scared i tried to take a photo but i couldn't move my arms it's like i had a hold of me i just could not move at all. 

6. i can't remember losing sight i had lost 30 minutes that i cannot account for also i had moved position from when i had first seen the ufo by a meter what i had just started smoking had gone out to .I checked for heat from the joint and it was like it had been out a long time.

the photo attached to this testimony is taken from the internet because of ( read point 5 )
content.summary: Hovered above me for a minute i had lost 30 minutes i cant account for.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side during a storm smoking when i decided to take a video of the clouds. i later went back to my video to look at it and that's when i noticed somthing more than just clouds in my video.
content.summary: Took a video of some clouds during a storm when i later looked i saw somthing in my video
